Description:
Description The primary function of this position is to supervise the execution of the assembly and tightening of bolted connections using Manual, Hydraulic and Pneumatic Bolt Torquing Equipment. The role is also required to perform pressure testing and leak testing of systems using test equipment. Key Duties:Ensure Bolt Torquing duties are carried out to Client and Company specifications and operating  procedures which include: Selecting suitable equipment to suit application 
Selecting correct torque and tension values from Company provided information 
Execution of bolt torquing activities utilizing hydraulic torque wrenches, hydraulic tensioners, ancillary bolting equipment and hydraulic pumps to ensure that the site equipment is maintained on a regular and daily basis throughout the work scope duration 
Experienced in supervising technicians in using tensioning and torque wrench equipment 
Effective assistance and completion of relevant Company documentation 
Engage and assist with the completion of Company assessments and competency  programmes 
Develop Bolt Torquing procedures as required 
Assist in front end planning of projects 
Maintain equipment in good and proper order 
Effectively communicate with the Client representative, office Engineering Team and Site Teams to ensure all site activities are progressed in a timely manner 
Ensure proper housekeeping (all work sites left in clean and safe condition upon completion of job) 
Perform other related duties as assigned by Supervisor or Site Engineer 
Ability to administer training on proper torqueing and tensioning techniques Skills
